fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player to Curse during the night. (2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the day, Cursed players have their roles rerolled into a role of the same Faction and Subalignment.
- New abilities with limited uses will lose the same amount of uses on previous limited use abilities by the player.
- You may not Curse yourself.
- When you die, the Curse lifts.
